snippet: A collision occurred early Saturday when, according to the police, a car traveling "at a high rate of speed" drove through a red light and slammed into another vehicle in Gravesend.
abstract: A collision occurred early Saturday when, according to the police, a car traveling "at a high rate of speed" drove through a red light and slammed into another vehicle in Gravesend.

byline.original: By COLIN MOYNIHAN and JULIE TURKEWITZ

headline.main: Two Men and a Woman Are Killed in a Brooklyn Crash
